WARNING: This reference may be out of date. It aims to demonstrate __pkgdoc__ -- not to provide a search tool for the tidyverse.

```{r}
library(pkgdoc)
library(tidyverse)

reference_package(tidyverse:::core) %>% 
  arrange(package) %>% 
  DT::datatable()
```
